meanings.definition: Not communicating or not willing to communicate.
meanings.sent1: The shy student remained noncommunicative during the group project.
meanings.sent2: The noncommunicative cat refused to meow or purr.
meanings.sent3: The noncommunicative computer screen just displayed a blank page.
meanings.sent4: The fog was so thick, it felt noncommunicative, hiding everything from view.
meanings.sent5: The closed door was a noncommunicative barrier, revealing nothing about what lay beyond.

meanings.definition: Failing to convey information or ideas effectively.
meanings.sent1: The noncommunicative presentation left the audience confused.
meanings.sent2: The noncommunicative map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent3: The noncommunicative recipe resulted in a burnt cake.
meanings.sent4: The noncommunicative traffic signs caused chaos on the road.
meanings.sent5: The noncommunicative instructions left us stranded in the middle of nowhere.
